Check out this cool new chat-browser from Swapcast - surf, watch and share - all in one app!    Get started with Swapcast on your PC or Mac NOW - with this Chrome App.

Swapcast all-in-one chat-browser: 
 - Chat and Message with your friends - while you browse clips and webpages!
- FREE Video Chat
- FREE Screen Share - share movies and sport events directly with your friends.
- Safe n' Easy link sharing with your best friends ONLY! 
- Unlimited Friends invite 
- Send snapshot photos and files directly from PC or Mac
 - Lots of FREE emoticons.
 - Swapcast works on both 3G and WiFi.
- Surf internet with Swapcast, and share your favourite clips easy with your friends.
